00150 // custom class for struct linger conversion
00151 jobject UDT_NewLingerUDT( //
00152                 JNIEnv * const env, //
00153                 linger * const lingerValue //
00154                 ) {
00155         CHK_NUL_RET_NUL(env, "env");
00156         CHK_NUL_RET_NUL(lingerValue, "lingerValue");
00157         int value;
00158         if (lingerValue->l_onoff == 0) {
00159                 value = 0;
00160         } else {
00161                 value = lingerValue->l_linger;
00162         }
00163         jobject objLinger = env->NewObject(udt_clsLingerUDT,
00164                         udt_clsLingerUDT_initID, (jint) value);
00165         CHK_NUL_RET_NUL(objLinger, "objLinger");
00166         return objLinger;
00167 }

00169 // java wrapper exception error codes; keep in sync with ErrorUDT.java
00170 #define UDT_WRAPPER_UNKNOWN -1 // WRAPPER_UNKNOWN(-1, "unknown error code"), //
00171 #define UDT_WRAPPER_UNIMPLEMENTED -2 // WRAPPER_UNIMPLEMENTED(-2, "this feature is not yet implemented"), //
00172 #define UDT_WRAPPER_MESSAGE -3 // WRAPPER_MESSAGE(-3, "wrapper generated error"), //
00173 #define UDT_USER_DEFINED_MESSAGE -4 // USER_DEFINED_MESSAGE(-4, "user defined message"), //
00174 //

00176 // NOTE: socket id stored in java object SocketUDT
00177 jint UDT_GetSocketID( //
00178                 JNIEnv * const env, //
00179                 const jobject self //
00180                 ) {
00181         return env->GetIntField(self, udts_SocketID);
00182 }
00183 // NOTE: socket id stored in java object SocketUDT
00184 void UDT_SetSocketID( //
00185                 JNIEnv * const env, //
00186                 const jobject self, //
00187                 const jint socketID //
00188                 ) {
00189         env->SetIntField(self, udts_SocketID, socketID);
00190 }

00192 jthrowable UDT_NewExceptionUDT( //
00193                 JNIEnv * const env, //
00194                 const jint socketID, //
00195                 const jint errorCode, //
00196                 const char* message //
00197                 ) {
00198         CHK_NUL_RET_NUL(env, "env");
00199         const jstring messageString = env->NewStringUTF(message);
00200         CHK_NUL_RET_NUL(messageString, "messageString");
00201         const jobject exception = env->NewObject(udt_clsExceptionUDT,
00202                         udt_clsExceptionUDT_initID0, socketID, errorCode, messageString);
00203         return static_cast<jthrowable>(exception);
00204 }
00205 
00206 void UDT_ThrowExceptionUDT_Message( //
00207                 JNIEnv * const env, //
00208                 const jint socketID, //
00209                 const char *comment //
00210                 ) {
00211         CHK_NUL_RET_RET(env, "env");
00212         CHK_NUL_RET_RET(comment, "comment");
00213         const jint code = UDT_WRAPPER_MESSAGE;
00214         const jthrowable exception = UDT_NewExceptionUDT(env, socketID, code,
00215                         comment);
00216         CHK_NUL_RET_RET(exception, "exception");
00217         env->Throw(exception);
00218 }

00220 // socketID == 0 means not applicable / not known id
00221 void UDT_ThrowExceptionUDT_ErrorInfo( //
00222                 JNIEnv * const env, //
00223                 const jint socketID, //
00224                 const char* comment, //
00225                 UDT::ERRORINFO * const errorInfo //
00226                 ) {
00227         CHK_NUL_RET_RET(env, "env");
00228         CHK_NUL_RET_RET(comment, "comment");
00229         CHK_NUL_RET_RET(errorInfo, "errorInfo");
00230         const jint code = errorInfo->getErrorCode();
00231         const jthrowable exception = //
00232                         UDT_NewExceptionUDT(env, socketID, code, comment);
00233         CHK_NUL_RET_RET(exception, "exception");
00234         env->Throw(exception);
00235 }

00245         udtm_pktSentTotal = env->GetFieldID(cls, "pktSentTotal", "J"); // total number of sent data packets, including retransmissions
00246         udtm_pktRecvTotal = env->GetFieldID(cls, "pktRecvTotal", "J"); // total number of received packets
00247         udtm_pktSndLossTotal = env->GetFieldID(cls, "pktSndLossTotal", "I"); // total number of lost packets (sender side)
00248         udtm_pktRcvLossTotal = env->GetFieldID(cls, "pktRcvLossTotal", "I"); // total number of lost packets (receiver side)
00249         udtm_pktRetransTotal = env->GetFieldID(cls, "pktRetransTotal", "I"); // total number of retransmitted packets
00250         udtm_pktSentACKTotal = env->GetFieldID(cls, "pktSentACKTotal", "I"); // total number of sent ACK packets
00251         udtm_pktRecvACKTotal = env->GetFieldID(cls, "pktRecvACKTotal", "I"); // total number of received ACK packets
00252         udtm_pktSentNAKTotal = env->GetFieldID(cls, "pktSentNAKTotal", "I"); // total number of sent NAK packets
00253         udtm_pktRecvNAKTotal = env->GetFieldID(cls, "pktRecvNAKTotal", "I"); // total number of received NAK packets
00254         udtm_usSndDurationTotal = env->GetFieldID(cls, "usSndDurationTotal", "J"); // total time duration when UDT is sending data (idle time exclusive)
00255 
00256         // local measurements
00257         udtm_pktSent = env->GetFieldID(cls, "pktSent", "J"); // number of sent data packets, including retransmissions
00258         udtm_pktRecv = env->GetFieldID(cls, "pktRecv", "J"); // number of received packets
00259         udtm_pktSndLoss = env->GetFieldID(cls, "pktSndLoss", "I"); // number of lost packets (sender side)
00260         udtm_pktRcvLoss = env->GetFieldID(cls, "pktRcvLoss", "I"); // number of lost packets (receiverer side)

00266         udtm_mbpsSendRate = env->GetFieldID(cls, "mbpsSendRate", "D"); // sending rate in Mb/s
00267         udtm_mbpsRecvRate = env->GetFieldID(cls, "mbpsRecvRate", "D"); // receiving rate in Mb/s
00268         udtm_usSndDuration = env->GetFieldID(cls, "usSndDuration", "J"); // busy sending time (i.e., idle time exclusive)

00299         X_InitClassReference(env, &jdk_clsIterator, "java/util/Iterator");
00300

00303         X_InitClassReference(env, &udt_clsSocketUDT, //
00304                         "com/barchart/udt/SocketUDT");

00306                         "com/barchart/udt/TypeUDT");

00310                         "com/barchart/udt/MonitorUDT");

00325

00329 
00330         X_FreeClassReference(env, &jdk_clsInet4Address);
00331         X_FreeClassReference(env, &jdk_clsInet6Address);
00332         X_FreeClassReference(env, &jdk_clsInetSocketAddress);
00333 
00334         X_FreeClassReference(env, &jdk_clsSocketException);
00335 
00336         X_FreeClassReference(env, &jdk_clsSet);
00337         X_FreeClassReference(env, &jdk_clsIterator);
00338 
00339         // UDT
00340 
00341         X_FreeClassReference(env, &udt_clsSocketUDT);
00342         X_FreeClassReference(env, &udt_clsTypeUDT);
00343         X_FreeClassReference(env, &udt_clsFactoryUDT);
00344         X_FreeClassReference(env, &udt_clsMonitorUDT);

00347         X_FreeClassReference(env, &udt_clsCCC);
00348         X_FreeClassReference(env, &udt_clsFactoryInterfaceUDT);

00357                         "Ljava/net/InetAddress;");
00358         isa_PortID = env->GetFieldID(jdk_clsInetSocketAddress, "port", "I");
00359 
00360         // UDT SocketUDT
00361 
00362         udts_SocketID = env->GetFieldID(udt_clsSocketUDT, //
00363                         "socketID", "I");
00364         udts_RemoteSocketAddressID = env->GetFieldID(udt_clsSocketUDT, //
00365                         "remoteSocketAddress", "Ljava/net/InetSocketAddress;");
00366         udts_LocalSocketAddressID = env->GetFieldID(udt_clsSocketUDT, //
00367                         "localSocketAddress", "Ljava/net/InetSocketAddress;");
00368         udts_TypeID = env->GetFieldID(udt_clsSocketUDT, //
00369                         "type", "Lcom/barchart/udt/TypeUDT;");
00370         udts_MonitorID = env->GetFieldID(udt_clsSocketUDT, //
00371                         "monitor", "Lcom/barchart/udt/MonitorUDT;");
00372 
00373         udts_IsSelectedReadID = env->GetFieldID(udt_clsSocketUDT, //
00374                         "isSelectedRead", "Z");
00375         udts_IsSelectedWriteID = env->GetFieldID(udt_clsSocketUDT, //
00376                         "isSelectedWrite", "Z");
00377         udts_IsSelectedExceptionID = env->GetFieldID(udt_clsSocketUDT, //
00378                         "isSelectedException", "Z");
00379 
00380         // UDT TypeUDT
00381 
00382         udtt_TypeCodeID = env->GetFieldID(udt_clsTypeUDT, "code", "I");
00383 
00384         // UDT MonitorUDT
00385 
00386         UDT_InitFieldMonitor(env);
00387 
00388         // UDT CCC
00389 
00390         udt_clsCCC_fld_nativeHandleID = env->GetFieldID(udt_clsCCC, "nativeHandle",
00391                         "J");

00473 /* signature is a monotonously increasing integer; set in java class SocketUDT */
00474 
00475 // validate consistency of java code and native library
00476 JNIEXPORT jint JNICALL Java_com_barchart_udt_SocketUDT_getSignatureJNI0( //
00477                 JNIEnv * const env, //
00478                 const jclass clsSocketUDT //
00479                 ) {
00480 
00481         UNUSED(env);
00482         UNUSED(clsSocketUDT);
00483 
00484         return com_barchart_udt_SocketUDT_SIGNATURE_JNI;
00485 
00486 }
00487 
00488 // called on java class load
00489 JNIEXPORT void JNICALL Java_com_barchart_udt_SocketUDT_initClass0( //
00490                 JNIEnv* const env, //
00491                 const jclass clsSocketUDT //
00492                 ) {
00493 
00494         UNUSED(env);
00495         UNUSED(clsSocketUDT);
00496 
00497         UDT_InitClassRefAll(env);
00498 
00499         UDT_InitFieldRefAll(env);
00500 
00501         UDT_InitMethodRefAll(env);
00502 
00503         const int rv = UDT::startup();
00504 
00505         if (rv == UDT::ERROR) {
00506                 UDT::ERRORINFO errorInfo = UDT::getlasterror();
00507                 UDT_ThrowExceptionUDT_ErrorInfo( //
00508                                 env, 0, "initClass0:startup", &errorInfo);
00509                 return;
00510         }
00511 
00512 }

00582 JNIEXPORT jobject JNICALL Java_com_barchart_udt_SocketUDT_accept0( //
00583                 JNIEnv * const env, //
00584                 const jobject self //
00585                 ) {
00586 
00587         sockaddr remoteSockAddr;
00588         int remoteSockAddrSize = sizeof(remoteSockAddr);
00589 
00590         const jint socketID = UDT_GetSocketID(env, self);
00591 
00592         const jint socketACC = UDT::accept(socketID, &remoteSockAddr,
00593                         &remoteSockAddrSize);
00594 
00595         if (socketACC == UDT::INVALID_SOCK) {
00596 
00597                 UDT::ERRORINFO errorInfo = UDT::getlasterror();
00598 
00599                 const jint errorCode = errorInfo.getErrorCode();
00600 
00601                 if (errorCode == UDT::ERRORINFO::EASYNCRCV) {
00602                         // not a java exception: non-blocking mode return, when not connections in the queue
00603                 } else {
00604                         // really exception
00605                         UDT_ThrowExceptionUDT_ErrorInfo( //
00606                                         env, socketID, "accept0:accept", &errorInfo);
00607                 }
00608 
00609                 return NULL;
00610 
00611         }
00612 
00613         jobject objTypeUDT = env->GetObjectField(self, udts_TypeID);
00614 
00615         CHK_NUL_RET_NUL(objTypeUDT, "objTypeUDT");
00616 
00617         jobject objSocketUDT = env->NewObject(udt_clsSocketUDT,
00618                         udt_clsSocketUDT_initID1, objTypeUDT, socketACC);
00619 
00620         CHK_NUL_RET_NUL(objSocketUDT, "objSocketUDT");
00621 
00622         return objSocketUDT;
00623 
00624 }

00626 JNIEXPORT void JNICALL Java_com_barchart_udt_SocketUDT_bind0( //
00627                 JNIEnv * const env, //
00628                 const jobject self, //
00629                 const jobject objLocalSocketAddress //
00630                 ) {
00631 
00632         const jint socketID = UDT_GetSocketID(env, self);
00633 
00634         int rv;
00635 
00636         sockaddr localSockAddr;
00637 
00638         rv = X_InitSockAddr(&localSockAddr);
00639 
00640         if (rv == JNI_ERR) {
00641                 UDT_ThrowExceptionUDT_Message(env, socketID, "can not X_InitSockAddr");
00642                 return;
00643         }
00644 
00645         rv = X_ConvertInetSocketAddressToSockaddr(env, objLocalSocketAddress,
00646                         &localSockAddr);
00647 
00648         if (rv == JNI_ERR) {
00649                 UDT_ThrowExceptionUDT_Message(env, socketID,
00650                                 "can not X_ConvertInetSocketAddressToSockaddr");
00651                 return;
00652         }
00653 
00654         rv = UDT::bind(socketID, &localSockAddr, sizeof(localSockAddr));
00655 
00656         if (rv == UDT::ERROR) {
00657                 UDT::ERRORINFO errorInfo = UDT::getlasterror();
00658                 UDT_ThrowExceptionUDT_ErrorInfo( //
00659                                 env, socketID, "bind0:bind", &errorInfo);
00660                 return;
00661         }
00662 
00663 }

00684 JNIEXPORT void JNICALL Java_com_barchart_udt_SocketUDT_connect0( //

00686                 const jobject objRemoteSocketAddress //
00687                 ) {
00688

00690

00692                 UDT_ThrowExceptionUDT_Message(env, socketID,
00693                                 "objRemoteSocketAddress == NULL");
00694                 return;
00695         }
00696 
00697         int rv;
00698

00700

00702

00704                 UDT_ThrowExceptionUDT_Message(env, socketID, "can not X_InitSockAddr");
00705                 return;
00706         }
00707

00709                         objRemoteSocketAddress, &remoteSockAddr);
00710

00712                 UDT_ThrowExceptionUDT_Message(env, socketID,
00713                                 "can not X_ConvertInetSocketAddressToSockaddr");
00714                 return;
00715         }
00716 
00717         rv = UDT::connect(socketID, &remoteSockAddr, sizeof(remoteSockAddr));
00718

00720                 UDT::ERRORINFO errorInfo = UDT::getlasterror();
00721                 UDT_ThrowExceptionUDT_ErrorInfo( //
00722                                 env, socketID, "connect0:connect", &errorInfo);

00728 JNIEXPORT jboolean JNICALL Java_com_barchart_udt_SocketUDT_hasLoadedRemoteSocketAddress( //
00729                 JNIEnv * const env, //
00730                 const jobject self //
00731                 ) {
00732 
00733         const jint socketID = UDT_GetSocketID(env, self);
00734 
00735         sockaddr remoteSockAddr;
00736         int remoteSockAddrSize = sizeof(remoteSockAddr);
00737 
00738         // "peer" is remote
00739         const int rv = UDT::getpeername( //
00740                         socketID, &remoteSockAddr, &remoteSockAddrSize);
00741 
00742         if (rv == UDT::ERROR) {
00743                 // no exceptions
00744                 return JNI_FALSE;
00745         }
00746 
00747         jobject objRemoteSocketAddress = env->GetObjectField(self,
00748                         udts_RemoteSocketAddressID);
00749 
00750         if (objRemoteSocketAddress == NULL
00751                         || !X_IsSockaddrEqualsInetSocketAddress(env, &remoteSockAddr,
00752                                         objRemoteSocketAddress)) {
00753 
00754                 objRemoteSocketAddress = X_NewInetSocketAddress(env, &remoteSockAddr);
00755 
00756                 env->SetObjectField(self, udts_RemoteSocketAddressID,
00757                                 objRemoteSocketAddress);
00758 
00759         }
00760 
00761         return JNI_TRUE;
00762 
00763 }

00801 
00802 // struct that fits all UDT options types
00803 union UDT_OptVal {
00804         void* factory;
00805         linger lingerValue;
00806         int64_t longValue;
00807         int intValue;
00808         bool boolValue;
00809 };
00810 
00811 JNIEXPORT jobject JNICALL Java_com_barchart_udt_SocketUDT_getOption0( //
00812                 JNIEnv * const env, //
00813                 const jobject self, //
00814                 const jint enumCode, //
00815                 const jclass klaz //
00816                 ) {
00817 
00818         UDT::SOCKOPT optionName = (UDT::SOCKOPT) enumCode;
00819         UDT_OptVal optionValue;
00820         int optionValueSize = sizeof(optionValue);
00821 
00822         const jint socketID = UDT_GetSocketID(env, self);
00823 
00824         const int rv = UDT::getsockopt( //
00825                         socketID, 0, optionName, (void*) &optionValue, &optionValueSize);
00826 
00827         if (rv == UDT::ERROR) {
00828                 UDT::ERRORINFO errorInfo = UDT::getlasterror();
00829                 UDT_ThrowExceptionUDT_ErrorInfo( //
00830                                 env, socketID, "getOption0:getsockopt", &errorInfo);
00831                 return NULL;
00832         }
00833 
00834         if (env->IsSameObject(klaz, jdk_clsBoolean)) {
00835 
00836                 return X_NewBoolean(env, optionValue.boolValue);
00837 
00838         } else if (env->IsSameObject(klaz, jdk_clsInteger)) {
00839 
00840                 return X_NewInteger(env, optionValue.intValue);
00841 
00842         } else if (env->IsSameObject(klaz, udt_clsLingerUDT)) {
00843 
00844                 return UDT_NewLingerUDT(env, &(optionValue.lingerValue));
00845 
00846         } else if (env->IsSameObject(klaz, jdk_clsLong)) {
00847 
00848                 return X_NewLong(env, optionValue.longValue);
00849 
00850         } else if (env->IsSameObject(klaz, udt_clsFactoryUDT)) {
00851 
00852                 CCC* pCCC = reinterpret_cast<CCC*>(optionValue.factory);
00853 
00854                 //check to see if they type is as JNICCC class
00855                 JNICCC* pJNICCC = dynamic_cast<JNICCC*>(pCCC);
00856 
00857                 if (pJNICCC != NULL) {
00858                         //it is, so return the corresponding Java CCC (or derivative) class
00859                         return pJNICCC->getJavaCCC();
00860                 } else {
00861                         //it's a plain CCC class or standard C++ congestion
00862                         //control class so return NULL instead
00863                         return NULL;
00864                 }
00865 
00866         } else {
00867 
00868                 UDT_ThrowExceptionUDT_Message(env, socketID,
00869                                 "unsupported option class in OptionUDT");
00870 
00871                 return NULL;
00872         }
00873 
00874 }
00875 
00876 JNIEXPORT void JNICALL Java_com_barchart_udt_SocketUDT_setOption0( //
00877                 JNIEnv * const env, //
00878                 const jobject self, //
00879                 const jint enumCode, //
00880                 const jclass klaz, //
00881                 const jobject objValue //
00882                 ) {
00883 
00884         const jint socketID = UDT_GetSocketID(env, self);
00885 
00886         UDT::SOCKOPT optionName = (UDT::SOCKOPT) enumCode;
00887         UDT_OptVal optionValue;
00888         int optionValueSize = sizeof(optionValue);
00889 
00890         if (env->IsSameObject(klaz, jdk_clsBoolean)) {
00891 
00892                 jmethodID methodID = //
00893                                 env->GetMethodID(jdk_clsBoolean, "booleanValue", "()Z");
00894                 jboolean value = env->CallBooleanMethod(objValue, methodID);
00895 
00896                 optionValue.boolValue = BOOL(value);
00897                 optionValueSize = sizeof(bool);
00898 
00899         } else if (env->IsSameObject(klaz, jdk_clsInteger)) {
00900 
00901                 jmethodID methodID = //
00902                                 env->GetMethodID(jdk_clsInteger, "intValue", "()I");
00903                 jint value = env->CallIntMethod(objValue, methodID);
00904 
00905                 optionValue.intValue = value;
00906                 optionValueSize = sizeof(int);
00907 
00908         } else if (env->IsSameObject(klaz, udt_clsLingerUDT)) {
00909 
00910                 jmethodID methodID = //
00911                                 env->GetMethodID(udt_clsLingerUDT, "intValue", "()I");
00912                 int value = env->CallIntMethod(objValue, methodID);
00913 
00914                 if (value <= 0) {
00915                         optionValue.lingerValue.l_onoff = 0;
00916                         optionValue.lingerValue.l_linger = 0;
00917                 } else {
00918                         optionValue.lingerValue.l_onoff = 1;
00919                         optionValue.lingerValue.l_linger = value; // msvc C4244
00920                 }
00921 
00922                 optionValueSize = sizeof(linger);
00923 
00924         } else if (env->IsSameObject(klaz, jdk_clsLong)) {
00925 
00926                 jmethodID methodID = //
00927                                 env->GetMethodID(jdk_clsLong, "longValue", "()J");
00928                 jlong value = env->CallLongMethod(objValue, methodID);
00929 
00930                 optionValue.longValue = value;
00931                 optionValueSize = sizeof(int64_t);
00932 
00933         } else if (env->IsSameObject(klaz, udt_clsFactoryUDT)) {
00934 
00935                 optionValue.factory = new JNICCCFactory(env, objValue);
00936                 optionValueSize = sizeof(void*);
00937 
00938         } else {
00939 
00940                 UDT_ThrowExceptionUDT_Message(env, socketID,
00941                                 "unsupported option class in OptionUDT");
00942 
00943                 return;
00944         }
00945 
00946         const int rv = UDT::setsockopt(socketID, 0, optionName,
00947                         (void*) (optionName == UDT_CC ? optionValue.factory : &optionValue),
00948                         optionValueSize);
00949 
00950         if (optionName == UDT_CC && optionValue.factory != NULL) {
00951                 delete reinterpret_cast<JNICCCFactory*>(optionValue.factory);
00952         }
00953 
00954         if (rv == UDT::ERROR) {
00955                 UDT::ERRORINFO errorInfo = UDT::getlasterror();
00956                 UDT_ThrowExceptionUDT_ErrorInfo( //
00957                                 env, socketID, "setOption0:setsockopt", &errorInfo);
00958                 return;
00959         }
00960 
00961 }

00982 // #########################################################################
00983 
00984 bool X_IsValidRange(JNIEnv *env, jint socketID, //
00985                 jlong position, jlong limit, jlong capacity) {
00986         if (!X_IsInRange(0, position, capacity)) {
00987                 UDT_ThrowExceptionUDT_Message(env, socketID,
00988                                 "position is out of range");
00989                 return false;
00990         }
00991         if (!X_IsInRange(0, limit, capacity)) {
00992                 UDT_ThrowExceptionUDT_Message(env, socketID, "limit is out of range");
00993                 return false;
00994         }
00995         if (position > limit) {
00996                 UDT_ThrowExceptionUDT_Message(env, socketID, "position > limit");
00997                 return false;
00998         }
00999         return true;
01000 }
01001 
01002 // #######################################################################
01003 
01004 /*
01005  * receiveX call is shared for both receive() and receivemsg()
01006  */
01007 
01008 // return values, if exception is NOT thrown
01009 // -1 : nothing received (non-blocking only)
01010 // =0 : timeout expired (blocking only)
01011 // >0 : normal receive
01012 jint UDT_ReturnReceiveError( //
01013                 JNIEnv * const env, //
01014                 const jint socketID //
01015                 ) {
01016         UDT::ERRORINFO errorInfo = UDT::getlasterror();
01017         const int errorCode = errorInfo.getErrorCode();
01018         if (errorCode == UDT::ERRORINFO::EASYNCRCV) {
01019                 // not a java exception: non-blocking mode return when nothing is received
01020         } else {
01021                 // really exception
01022                 UDT_ThrowExceptionUDT_ErrorInfo( //
01023                                 env, socketID, "recv/recvmsg", &errorInfo);
01024         }
01025         return JNI_ERR;
01026 }
01027 
01028 // receive into complete array
01029 JNIEXPORT jint JNICALL Java_com_barchart_udt_SocketUDT_receive0( //
01030                 JNIEnv * const env, //
01031                 const jclass clsSocketUDT, //
01032                 const jint socketID, //
01033                 const jint socketType, //
01034                 const jbyteArray arrayObj //
01035                 ) {
01036 
01037         UNUSED(clsSocketUDT);
01038 
01039         jboolean isCopy; // whether JVM returns a reference or a copy
01040 
01041         jbyte * const data = env->GetByteArrayElements(arrayObj, &isCopy); // note: must release
01042 
01043         const jsize size = env->GetArrayLength(arrayObj);
01044 
01045         int rv;
01046 
01047         switch (socketType) {
01048         case SOCK_STREAM:
01049                 rv = UDT::recv(socketID, (char*) data, (int) size, 0);
01050                 break;
01051         case SOCK_DGRAM:
01052                 rv = UDT::recvmsg(socketID, (char*) data, (int) size);
01053                 break;
01054         default:
01055                 env->ReleaseByteArrayElements(arrayObj, data, JNI_ABORT); // do not copy back
01056                 UDT_ThrowExceptionUDT_Message(env, socketID,
01057                                 "recv/recvmsg : unexpected socketType");
01058                 return JNI_ERR;
01059         }
01060 
01061         if (rv > 0) { // normal
01062                 env->ReleaseByteArrayElements(arrayObj, data, JNI_UPDATE); //
01063                 return rv;
01064         } else if (rv < 0) { // UDT::ERROR
01065                 env->ReleaseByteArrayElements(arrayObj, data, JNI_ABORT); //
01066                 return UDT_ReturnReceiveError(env, socketID);
01067         } else { // ==0; UDT_TIMEOUT
01068                 env->ReleaseByteArrayElements(arrayObj, data, JNI_ABORT); //
01069                 return UDT_TIMEOUT;
01070         }
01071 
01072 }
01073 
01074 // receive into a portion of an array
01075 JNIEXPORT jint JNICALL Java_com_barchart_udt_SocketUDT_receive1( //
01076                 JNIEnv * const env, //
01077                 const jclass clsSocketUDT, //
01078                 const jint socketID, //
01079                 const jint socketType, //
01080                 const jbyteArray arrayObj, //
01081                 const jint position, //
01082                 const jint limit //
01083                 ) {
01084 
01085         UNUSED(clsSocketUDT);
01086 
01087         const jsize capacity = env->GetArrayLength(arrayObj);
01088 
01089         if (!X_IsValidRange(env, socketID, position, limit, capacity)) {
01090                 return JNI_ERR;
01091         }
01092 
01093         const jsize size = limit - position;
01094 
01095         jbyte * const data = (jbyte *) malloc(sizeof(jbyte) * size);
01096 
01097         if (data == NULL) {
01098                 UDT_ThrowExceptionUDT_Message(env, socketID,
01099                                 "recv/recvmsg : can not allocate data array");
01100                 return JNI_ERR;
01101         }
01102 
01103         int rv;
01104 
01105         switch (socketType) {
01106         case SOCK_STREAM:
01107                 rv = UDT::recv(socketID, (char*) data, (int) size, 0);
01108                 break;
01109         case SOCK_DGRAM:
01110                 rv = UDT::recvmsg(socketID, (char*) data, (int) size);
01111                 break;
01112         default:
01113                 free(data);
01114                 UDT_ThrowExceptionUDT_Message(env, socketID,
01115                                 "recv/recvmsg : unexpected socketType");
01116                 return JNI_ERR;
01117         }
01118 
01119         if (rv > 0) { // normal
01120                 env->SetByteArrayRegion(arrayObj, position, rv, data);
01121                 free(data);
01122                 return rv;
01123         } else if (rv < 0) { // UDT::ERROR
01124                 free(data);
01125                 return UDT_ReturnReceiveError(env, socketID);
01126         } else { // ==0; UDT_TIMEOUT
01127                 free(data);
01128                 return UDT_TIMEOUT;
01129         }
01130 
01131 }
01132 
01133 // receive into direct byte buffer
01134 JNIEXPORT jint JNICALL Java_com_barchart_udt_SocketUDT_receive2( //
01135                 JNIEnv * const env, //
01136                 const jclass clsSocketUDT, //
01137                 const jint socketID, //
01138                 const jint socketType, //
01139                 const jobject bufferObj, //
01140                 const jint position, //
01141                 const jint limit //
01142                 ) {
01143 
01144         UNUSED(clsSocketUDT);
01145 
01146         const jlong capacity = env->GetDirectBufferCapacity(bufferObj);
01147 
01148         if (!X_IsValidRange(env, socketID, position, limit, capacity)) {
01149                 return JNI_ERR;
01150         }
01151 
01152         const jbyte * bufferAddress = //
01153                         static_cast<jbyte*>(env->GetDirectBufferAddress(bufferObj));
01154 
01155         const jbyte * data = bufferAddress + position;
01156         const jsize size = static_cast<jsize>(limit - position);
01157 
01158         // memory boundary test
01159         // assert(data[0] | 1);
01160         // assert(data[size - 1] | 1);
01161 
01162         int rv;
01163 
01164         switch (socketType) {
01165         case SOCK_STREAM:
01166                 rv = UDT::recv(socketID, (char*) data, (int) size, 0);
01167                 break;
01168         case SOCK_DGRAM:
01169                 rv = UDT::recvmsg(socketID, (char*) data, (int) size);
01170                 break;
01171         default:
01172                 UDT_ThrowExceptionUDT_Message(env, socketID,
01173                                 "recv/recvmsg : unexpected socketType");
01174                 return JNI_ERR;
01175         }
01176 
01177         if (rv > 0) { // normal
01178                 return rv;
01179         } else if (rv < 0) { //  UDT::ERROR
01180                 return UDT_ReturnReceiveError(env, socketID);
01181         } else { // ==0; UDT_TIMEOUT
01182                 return UDT_TIMEOUT;
01183         }
01184 
01185 }
01186 
01187 /*
01188  * sendXXX call is shared for both send() and sendmsg()
01189  */
01190 
01191 // return values, if exception is NOT thrown
01192 // -1 : no buffer space (non-blocking only )
01193 // =0 : timeout expired (blocking only)
01194 // >0 : normal send, byte count
01195 jint UDT_ReturnSendError( //
01196                 JNIEnv * const env, //
01197                 const jint socketID //
01198                 ) {
01199         UDT::ERRORINFO errorInfo = UDT::getlasterror();
01200         const int errorCode = errorInfo.getErrorCode();
01201         if (errorCode == UDT::ERRORINFO::EASYNCSND) {
01202                 // not a java exception: non-blocking mode return when no space in UDT buffer
01203         } else {
01204                 // really exception
01205                 UDT_ThrowExceptionUDT_ErrorInfo( //
01206                                 env, socketID, "send/sendmsg", &errorInfo);
01207         }
01208         return JNI_ERR;
01209 }
01210 
01211 // send from complete array
01212 JNIEXPORT jint JNICALL Java_com_barchart_udt_SocketUDT_send0( //
01213                 JNIEnv * const env, //
01214                 const jclass clsSocketUDT, //
01215                 const jint socketID, //
01216                 const jint socketType, //
01217                 const jint timeToLive, //
01218                 const jboolean isOrdered, //
01219                 const jbyteArray arrayObj //
01220                 ) {
01221 
01222         UNUSED(clsSocketUDT);
01223 
01224         jboolean isCopy; // whether JVM returned reference or copy
01225 
01226         jbyte * const data = env->GetByteArrayElements(arrayObj, &isCopy); // note: must release
01227 
01228         const jsize size = env->GetArrayLength(arrayObj);
01229 
01230         int rv;
01231 
01232         switch (socketType) {
01233         case SOCK_STREAM:
01234                 rv = UDT::send(socketID, (char*) data, (int) size, 0);
01235                 break;
01236         case SOCK_DGRAM:
01237                 rv = UDT::sendmsg(socketID, (char*) data, (int) size, (int) timeToLive,
01238                                 BOOL(isOrdered));
01239                 break;
01240         default:
01241                 env->ReleaseByteArrayElements(arrayObj, data, JNI_ABORT); // do not copy back
01242                 UDT_ThrowExceptionUDT_Message(env, socketID,
01243                                 "send/sendmsg : unexpected socketType");
01244                 return JNI_ERR;
01245         }
01246 
01247         env->ReleaseByteArrayElements(arrayObj, data, JNI_ABORT); // do not copy back
01248 
01249         if (rv > 0) { // normal
01250                 return rv;
01251         } else if (rv < 0) { // UDT::ERROR
01252                 return UDT_ReturnSendError(env, socketID);
01253         } else { // ==0; UDT_TIMEOUT
01254                 return UDT_TIMEOUT;
01255         }
01256 
01257 }
01258 
01259 // send from a portion of array
01260 JNIEXPORT jint JNICALL Java_com_barchart_udt_SocketUDT_send1( //
01261                 JNIEnv * const env, //
01262                 const jclass clsSocketUDT, //
01263                 const jint socketID, //
01264                 const jint socketType, //
01265                 const jint timeToLive, //
01266                 const jboolean isOrdered, //
01267                 const jbyteArray arrayObj, //
01268                 const jint position, //
01269                 const jint limit //
01270                 ) {
01271 
01272         UNUSED(clsSocketUDT);
01273 
01274         const jsize capacity = env->GetArrayLength(arrayObj);
01275 
01276         if (!X_IsValidRange(env, socketID, position, limit, capacity)) {
01277                 return JNI_ERR;
01278         }
01279 
01280         const jsize size = limit - position;
01281 
01282         jbyte * const data = (jbyte *) malloc(sizeof(jbyte) * size);
01283 
01284         if (data == NULL) {
01285                 UDT_ThrowExceptionUDT_Message(env, socketID,
01286                                 "send/sendmsg : can not allocate data array");
01287                 return JNI_ERR;
01288         }
01289 
01290         env->GetByteArrayRegion(arrayObj, position, size, data);
01291 
01292         int rv;
01293 
01294         switch (socketType) {
01295         case SOCK_STREAM:
01296                 rv = UDT::send(socketID, (char*) data, (int) size, 0);
01297                 break;
01298         case SOCK_DGRAM:
01299                 rv = UDT::sendmsg(socketID, (char*) data, (int) size, (int) timeToLive,
01300                                 BOOL(isOrdered));
01301                 break;
01302         default:
01303                 free(data);
01304                 UDT_ThrowExceptionUDT_Message(env, socketID,
01305                                 "send/sendmsg : unexpected socketType");
01306                 return JNI_ERR;
01307         }
01308 
01309         free(data);
01310 
01311         if (rv > 0) { // normal
01312                 return rv;
01313         } else if (rv < 0) { // UDT::ERROR
01314                 return UDT_ReturnSendError(env, socketID);
01315         } else { // ==0; UDT_TIMEOUT
01316                 return UDT_TIMEOUT;
01317         }
01318 
01319 }
01320 
01321 // send direct byte buffer
01322 JNIEXPORT jint JNICALL Java_com_barchart_udt_SocketUDT_send2( //
01323                 JNIEnv * const env, //
01324                 const jclass clsSocketUDT, //
01325                 const jint socketID, //
01326                 const jint socketType, //
01327                 const jint timeToLive, //
01328                 const jboolean isOrdered, //
01329                 const jobject bufferObj, //
01330                 const jint position, //
01331                 const jint limit //
01332                 ) {
01333 
01334         UNUSED(clsSocketUDT);
01335 
01336         const jlong capacity = env->GetDirectBufferCapacity(bufferObj);
01337 
01338         if (!X_IsValidRange(env, socketID, position, limit, capacity)) {
01339                 return JNI_ERR;
01340         }
01341 
01342         jbyte* bufferAddress = static_cast<jbyte*>(env->GetDirectBufferAddress(
01343                         bufferObj));
01344 
01345         const jbyte* data = bufferAddress + position;
01346         const jsize size = static_cast<jsize>(limit - position);
01347 
01348         // memory boundary test
01349         // assert(data[0] | 1);
01350         // assert(data[size - 1] | 1);
01351 
01352         int rv;
01353 
01354         switch (socketType) {
01355         case SOCK_STREAM:
01356                 rv = UDT::send(socketID, (char*) data, (int) size, 0);
01357                 break;
01358         case SOCK_DGRAM:
01359                 rv = UDT::sendmsg(socketID, (char*) data, (int) size, (int) timeToLive,
01360                                 BOOL(isOrdered));
01361                 break;
01362         default:
01363                 UDT_ThrowExceptionUDT_Message(env, socketID,
01364                                 "send/sendmsg : unexpected socketType");
01365                 return JNI_ERR;
01366         }
01367 
01368         if (rv > 0) { // normal
01369                 return rv;
01370         } else if (rv < 0) { // UDT::ERROR
01371                 return UDT_ReturnSendError(env, socketID);
01372         } else { // ==0; UDT_TIMEOUT
01373                 return UDT_TIMEOUT;
01374         }
01375 
01376 }

01417 JNIEXPORT void JNICALL Java_com_barchart_udt_SocketUDT_updateMonitor0( //
01418                 JNIEnv * const env, //
01419                 const jobject self, //
01420                 const jboolean makeClear //
01421                 ) {
01422 
01423         UDT::TRACEINFO monitor;
01424 
01425         const jint socketID = UDT_GetSocketID(env, self);
01426 
01427         const int rv = UDT::perfmon(socketID, &monitor, BOOL(makeClear));
01428 
01429         if (rv == UDT::ERROR) {
01430                 UDT::ERRORINFO errorInfo = UDT::getlasterror();
01431                 UDT_ThrowExceptionUDT_ErrorInfo( //
01432                                 env, socketID, "updateMonitor0:perfmon", &errorInfo);
01433                 return;
01434         }
01435 
01436         const jobject objMonitor = env->GetObjectField(self, udts_MonitorID);
01437 
01438         CHK_NUL_RET_RET(objMonitor, "objMonitor");
01439 
01440         // global measurements
01441         env->SetLongField(objMonitor, udtm_msTimeStamp, monitor.msTimeStamp); // time since the UDT entity is started, in milliseconds
01442         env->SetLongField(objMonitor, udtm_pktSentTotal, monitor.pktSentTotal); // total number of sent data packets, including retransmissions
01443         env->SetLongField(objMonitor, udtm_pktRecvTotal, monitor.pktRecvTotal); // total number of received packets
01444         env->SetIntField(objMonitor, udtm_pktSndLossTotal, monitor.pktSndLossTotal); // total number of lost packets (sender side)
01445         env->SetIntField(objMonitor, udtm_pktRcvLossTotal, monitor.pktRcvLossTotal); // total number of lost packets (receiver side)
01446         env->SetIntField(objMonitor, udtm_pktRetransTotal, monitor.pktRetransTotal); // total number of retransmitted packets
01447         env->SetIntField(objMonitor, udtm_pktSentACKTotal, monitor.pktSentACKTotal); // total number of sent ACK packets
01448         env->SetIntField(objMonitor, udtm_pktRecvACKTotal, monitor.pktRecvACKTotal); // total number of received ACK packets
01449         env->SetIntField(objMonitor, udtm_pktSentNAKTotal, monitor.pktSentNAKTotal); // total number of sent NAK packets
01450         env->SetIntField(objMonitor, udtm_pktRecvNAKTotal, monitor.pktRecvNAKTotal); // total number of received NAK packets
01451         env->SetLongField(objMonitor, udtm_usSndDurationTotal,
01452                         monitor.usSndDurationTotal); // total time duration when UDT is sending data (idle time exclusive)
01453 
01454         // local measurements
01455         env->SetLongField(objMonitor, udtm_pktSent, monitor.pktSent); // number of sent data packets, including retransmissions
01456         env->SetLongField(objMonitor, udtm_pktRecv, monitor.pktRecv); // number of received packets
01457         env->SetIntField(objMonitor, udtm_pktSndLoss, monitor.pktSndLoss); // number of lost packets (sender side)
01458         env->SetIntField(objMonitor, udtm_pktRcvLoss, monitor.pktRcvLoss); // number of lost packets (receiverer side)
01459         env->SetIntField(objMonitor, udtm_pktRetrans, monitor.pktRetrans); // number of retransmitted packets
01460         env->SetIntField(objMonitor, udtm_pktSentACK, monitor.pktSentACK); // number of sent ACK packets
01461         env->SetIntField(objMonitor, udtm_pktRecvACK, monitor.pktRecvACK); // number of received ACK packets
01462         env->SetIntField(objMonitor, udtm_pktSentNAK, monitor.pktSentNAK); // number of sent NAK packets
01463         env->SetIntField(objMonitor, udtm_pktRecvNAK, monitor.pktRecvNAK); // number of received NAK packets
01464         env->SetDoubleField(objMonitor, udtm_mbpsSendRate, monitor.mbpsSendRate); // sending rate in Mb/s
01465         env->SetDoubleField(objMonitor, udtm_mbpsRecvRate, monitor.mbpsRecvRate); // receiving rate in Mb/s
01466         env->SetLongField(objMonitor, udtm_usSndDuration, monitor.usSndDuration); // busy sending time (i.e., idle time exclusive)
01467 
01468         // instant measurements
01469         env->SetDoubleField(objMonitor, udtm_usPktSndPeriod,
01470                         monitor.usPktSndPeriod); // packet sending period, in microseconds
01471         env->SetIntField(objMonitor, udtm_pktFlowWindow, monitor.pktFlowWindow); // flow window size, in number of packets
01472         env->SetIntField(objMonitor, udtm_pktCongestionWindow,
01473                         monitor.pktCongestionWindow); // congestion window size, in number of packets
01474         env->SetIntField(objMonitor, udtm_pktFlightSize, monitor.pktFlightSize); // number of packets on flight
01475         env->SetDoubleField(objMonitor, udtm_msRTT, monitor.msRTT); // RTT, in milliseconds
01476         env->SetDoubleField(objMonitor, udtm_mbpsBandwidth, monitor.mbpsBandwidth); // estimated bandwidth, in Mb/s
01477         env->SetIntField(objMonitor, udtm_byteAvailSndBuf, monitor.byteAvailSndBuf); // available UDT sender buffer size
01478         env->SetIntField(objMonitor, udtm_byteAvailRcvBuf, monitor.byteAvailRcvBuf); // available UDT receiver buffer size
01479 
01480 }

01483 
01484 void UDT_CopyArrayToSet(jint* array, set<UDTSOCKET>* udSet, const jsize size) {
01485         for (jint index = 0; index < size; index++) {
01486                 const jint socketID = array[index];
01487                 udSet->insert(socketID);
01488         }
01489 }
01490 
01491 void UDT_CopySetToArray(set<UDTSOCKET>* udSet, jint* array, const jsize size) {
01492         set<UDTSOCKET>::iterator iterator = udSet->begin();
01493         for (jint index = 0; index < size; index++) {
01494                 const jint socketID = *iterator;
01495                 array[index] = socketID;
01496                 ++iterator;
01497         }
01498 }

01502 #define UDT_EXCEPT_INDEX        com_barchart_udt_SocketUDT_UDT_EXCEPT_INDEX
01503 #define UDT_SIZE_COUNT          com_barchart_udt_SocketUDT_UDT_SIZE_COUNT
01504 #define UDT_SELECT_LIMIT        com_barchart_udt_SocketUDT_DEFAULT_MAX_SELECTOR_SIZE

01651 
01652 JNIEXPORT jint JNICALL Java_com_barchart_udt_SocketUDT_epollWait0( //
01653                 JNIEnv * const env, //
01654                 const jclass clsSocketUDT, //
01655                 const jint pollID, //
01656                 const jobject objReadBuffer, //
01657                 const jobject objWriteBuffer, //
01658                 const jobject objSizeBuffer, //
01659                 const jlong millisTimeout //
01660                 ) {
01661 
01662         UNUSED(clsSocketUDT);
01663 
01664         // readiness sets
01665         set<UDTSOCKET> readSet;
01666         set<UDTSOCKET> writeSet;
01667 
01668         // readiness report
01669         const int rv = UDT::epoll_wait( //
01670                         pollID, &readSet, &writeSet, millisTimeout, NULL, NULL);
01671 
01672         // readiness reports size array
01673         jint* const sizeArray = //
01674                         static_cast<jint*>(env->GetDirectBufferAddress(objSizeBuffer));
01675 
01676         // process timeout & errors
01677         if (rv <= 0) { // UDT::ERROR is '-1'
01678                 UDT::ERRORINFO errorInfo = UDT::getlasterror();
01679                 if (errorInfo.getErrorCode() == UDT::ERRORINFO::ETIMEOUT) {
01680                         // not a java exception:
01681                         sizeArray[UDT_READ_INDEX] = 0;
01682                         sizeArray[UDT_WRITE_INDEX] = 0;
01683                         sizeArray[UDT_EXCEPT_INDEX] = 0;
01684                         return UDT_TIMEOUT;
01685                 } else {
01686                         // really exception
01687                         UDT_ThrowExceptionUDT_ErrorInfo( //
01688                                         env, 0, "epollWait0:epoll_wait", &errorInfo);
01689                         return JNI_ERR;
01690                 }
01691         }
01692 
01693         // return read interest
01694         const jsize readSize = readSet.size();
01695         sizeArray[UDT_READ_INDEX] = readSize;
01696         if (readSize > 0) {
01697                 if (readSize > env->GetDirectBufferCapacity(objReadBuffer)) {
01698                         UDT_ThrowExceptionUDT_Message(env, 0,
01699                                         "readSize > objReadBuffer capacity");
01700                         return JNI_ERR;
01701                 }
01702                 jint* const readArray = //
01703                                 static_cast<jint*>(env->GetDirectBufferAddress(objReadBuffer));
01704                 UDT_CopySetToArray(&readSet, readArray, readSize);
01705         }
01706 
01707         // return write interest
01708         const jsize writeSize = writeSet.size();
01709         sizeArray[UDT_WRITE_INDEX] = writeSize;
01710         if (writeSize > 0) {
01711                 if (writeSize > env->GetDirectBufferCapacity(objWriteBuffer)) {
01712                         UDT_ThrowExceptionUDT_Message(env, 0,
01713                                         "writeSize > objWriteBuffer capacity");
01714                         return JNI_ERR;
01715                 }
01716                 jint* const writeArray = //
01717                                 static_cast<jint*>(env->GetDirectBufferAddress(objWriteBuffer));
01718                 UDT_CopySetToArray(&writeSet, writeArray, writeSize);
01719         }
01720 
01721         return rv;
01722 
01723 }

01759 // test cost of JNI-to-Java set iteration
01760 JNIEXPORT void JNICALL Java_com_barchart_udt_SocketUDT_testIterateSet0( //
01761                 JNIEnv * const env, //
01762                 const jclass clsSocketUDT, //
01763                 const jobject objSet //
01764                 ) {
01765 
01766         UNUSED(clsSocketUDT);
01767 
01768         jobject iterator = env->CallObjectMethod(objSet, jdk_clsSet_iteratorID);
01769 
01770         jint count = 0;
01771 
01772         while (JNI_TRUE
01773                         == env->CallBooleanMethod(iterator, jdk_clsIterator_hasNextID)) {
01774                 jobject objAny = env->CallObjectMethod( //
01775                                 iterator, jdk_clsIterator_nextID);
01776                 UNUSED(objAny);
01777                 objAny = NULL;
01778                 count++;
01779         }
01780 
01781 }

01798 // test cost of array copy
01799 JNIEXPORT void JNICALL Java_com_barchart_udt_SocketUDT_testGetSetArray0( //
01800                 JNIEnv * const env, //
01801                 const jclass clsSocketUDT, //
01802                 const jintArray objArray, //
01803                 const jboolean isReturn //
01804                 ) {
01805 
01806         UNUSED(clsSocketUDT);
01807 
01808         jboolean isCopy;
01809 
01810         jint* data = env->GetIntArrayElements(objArray, &isCopy);
01811 
01812         //      jsize size = env->GetArrayLength(objArray);
01813 
01814         if (isReturn == JNI_TRUE) {
01815                 env->ReleaseIntArrayElements(objArray, data, JNI_UPDATE);
01816         } else {
01817                 env->ReleaseIntArrayElements(objArray, data, JNI_ABORT);
01818         }
01819 
01820 }

01824                 JNIEnv * const env, //
01825                 const jclass clsSocketUDT, //
01826                 const jint socketID //
01827                 ) {
01828 
01829         UNUSED(clsSocketUDT);
01830

01832 
01833         if (rv == UDT::ERROR) {
01834                 UDT::ERRORINFO errorInfo = UDT::getlasterror();
01835                 UDT_ThrowExceptionUDT_ErrorInfo( //
01836                                 env, socketID, "testInvalidClose0:close", &errorInfo);
01837                 return;
01838         }
01839 
01840 }

01912 // test cost of jni array fill
01913 JNIEXPORT void JNICALL Java_com_barchart_udt_SocketUDT_testFillArray0( //
01914                 JNIEnv * const env, //
01915                 const jclass clsSocketUDT, //
01916                 const jbyteArray arrayObj) {
01917 
01918         UNUSED(clsSocketUDT);
01919 
01920         jboolean isCopy;
01921         jbyte* array = env->GetByteArrayElements(arrayObj, &isCopy);
01922         jsize size = env->GetArrayLength(arrayObj);
01923 
01924         for (int k = 0; k < size; k++) {
01925                 array[k] = (char) k;
01926         }
01927 
01928         env->ReleaseByteArrayElements(arrayObj, array, JNI_UPDATE);
01929 
01930 }
